message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I think my product is worth more than $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $82.50
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I was thinking $78 would be a better price for me. Can you consider that?

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way to $78. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I can offer it to you for $80, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept
